title: Executive Order 7608-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5596 of April 9, 1931, Withdrawing Public Lands
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497, Executive Order No. 5596 of April 9, 1931, withdrawing public lands in Nevada, pending resurvey, is hereby revoked.
This order shall become effective upon the date of the official filing of the plat of the resurvey of said township.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7608-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5596 of April 9, 1931, Withdrawing Public Lands Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368973
